caption.p: Heat map of nutritional quantity from one serving of beans harvested from present-day (2017) and predicted future (2095) conditions. Concentration of nutrients ( 56Fe, 66Zn, total protein) and anti-nutritionals ( 208Pb, phytic acid) in a 50â€‰g serving of 20 common bean varieties under rainfed and drought conditions was calculated. Median, lower and upper quartile values were calculated for 56Fe, 66Zn, protein, 208Pb and phytic acid separately.
